complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the project foundation setup into specific configuration steps: Next.js project initialization, dependency installation and version management, Shadcn UI setup with theming, and folder structure creation with TypeScript configuration.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Standard project setup with well-documented tools. Complexity comes from coordinating multiple dependencies and ensuring compatibility, but most steps are straightforward following established patterns.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide Supabase configuration into: project creation and initial setup, authentication provider configuration, environment variable setup and security, TypeScript client configuration, and connection testing with error handling.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Involves external service configuration with security considerations. Requires understanding of authentication flows and proper environment variable management. Moderate complexity due to integration aspects.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down schema creation into: user table extension design, booking and blocked times table creation, subject and enum type definitions, foreign key relationship establishment, index optimization, and constraint validation testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to relational database design requiring careful consideration of relationships, constraints, and data integrity. Multiple interconnected tables with complex business logic requirements.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate RLS implementation into: policy planning and security model design, user profile access policies, student booking request policies, tutor management policies, blocked times access control, cross-table relationship policies, and comprehensive security testing with different user contexts.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Very high complexity requiring deep understanding of security models and PostgreSQL RLS. Multiple user roles with different access patterns. Critical for data security and requires extensive testing.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide authentication into: sign-up flow with role selection, sign-in page and validation, authentication context and state management, protected route middleware, session management and persistence, and role-based access control implementation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving multiple authentication flows, state management, and security considerations. Role-based access adds complexity. Critical system component requiring robust error handling.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down layout creation into: responsive layout structure design, role-based navigation component, user profile dropdown with authentication actions, and mobile-first responsive implementation with Tailwind CSS v4.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving responsive design and conditional rendering based on user roles. Well-established patterns but requires attention to UX and accessibility.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate time zone handling into: user time zone detection and storage, UTC conversion utility functions, local time display formatting, DST transition handling, and comprehensive time zone testing across different regions.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to time zone edge cases, DST transitions, and the critical nature of accurate time handling in a booking system. Requires thorough testing across multiple time zones.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide blocked times management into: CRUD operations with Supabase integration, calendar visualization component, time range selection form with validation, edit and delete functionality, time zone conversion integration, and conflict detection logic.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity combining database operations, UI components, time zone handling, and business logic. Requires integration of multiple systems and careful handling of time-based data.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down availability calculation into: core availability algorithm design, blocked time exclusion logic, time slot generation and validation, overlap detection and resolution, performance optimization and caching, and edge case handling for complex scenarios.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Very high complexity involving algorithmic thinking, performance considerations, and complex business logic. Critical component that affects booking accuracy. Requires extensive testing for edge cases.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide booking form into: form structure and validation schema design, date and time selection components, subject and duration selection, availability integration and real-time validation, form submission handling, and user experience optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to multiple form components, real-time validation, availability checking, and integration with time zone utilities. Requires good UX design and robust validation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down submission logic into: server-side validation and availability checking, booking request creation and data storage, concurrent booking conflict resolution, error handling and user feedback, and integration with notification system.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving server-side logic, race condition handling, and data integrity. Critical business logic that must handle concurrent users and maintain data consistency.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide student dashboard into: booking status sections and layout design, upcoming sessions with countdown timers, booking history and filtering, dashboard data fetching and state management, and navigation integration with booking form.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving data presentation, real-time updates, and user interface design. Requires integration with multiple data sources and good UX design.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down tutor dashboard into: booking request display and filtering, detailed booking information presentation, approve/reject action components, status management interface, time zone display integration, and notification badge implementation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to multiple user actions, data filtering, and integration with booking management system. Requires careful UX design for efficient workflow management.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide status management into: API endpoint creation for status updates, approve/reject action implementation, rejection notes functionality, status change validation and security, and integration with notification triggers.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving API design, business logic validation, and integration with multiple systems. Critical functionality requiring proper error handling and security.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down Edge Functions setup into: project structure initialization and TypeScript configuration, Deno dependencies and runtime setup, shared utilities and template system creation, and environment variable configuration for Edge Functions.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving new runtime environment (Deno) and serverless architecture. Requires understanding of Edge Functions deployment and configuration patterns.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide email templates into: responsive HTML template structure design, booking notification template creation, status update template variations, session reminder template, and cross-client compatibility testing and optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving HTML email design challenges, responsive design for email clients, and template system architecture. Requires testing across multiple email clients.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down booking notification into: Edge Function trigger setup and database integration, booking data extraction and formatting, email composition and sending logic, and error handling and logging implementation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving serverless function development and email integration. Straightforward logic but requires proper error handling and testing.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide status notification into: status change trigger detection, conditional email template selection, notification content personalization, and delivery confirmation and error handling.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity with conditional logic for different status types. Similar to task 17 but with additional branching logic for different notification types.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down session reminders into: cron job scheduling and configuration, upcoming session query logic, dual recipient email sending, and time zone-aware reminder timing optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving scheduled execution, database queries with time-based filtering, and sending to multiple recipients. Requires careful timing and time zone handling.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down webhook configuration into: database trigger setup and event configuration, webhook URL and authentication setup, function invocation testing and debugging, and error handling and retry mechanism implementation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving database triggers, webhook configuration, and system integration. Critical for notification system functionality and requires robust error handling.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide real-time updates into: Supabase real-time subscription setup, dashboard-specific subscription logic, subscription lifecycle management and cleanup, connection state handling and reconnection, and performance optimization for real-time data.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving real-time subscriptions, connection management, and performance considerations. Requires careful handling of subscription lifecycle and error states.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down validation and error handling into: comprehensive Zod schema creation, React error boundary implementation, toast notification system integration, user-friendly error message design, and validation feedback optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving validation logic, error boundary patterns, and user experience design. Requires comprehensive coverage of error scenarios and good UX design.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide accessibility implementation into: mobile responsive design optimization, ARIA label and semantic HTML implementation, keyboard navigation and focus management, color contrast and visual accessibility, screen reader compatibility testing, and accessibility audit and compliance verification.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity requiring comprehensive accessibility knowledge and testing across multiple devices and assistive technologies. Critical for inclusive design and compliance.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down performance optimization into: loading skeleton and state implementation, code splitting and lazy loading setup, database query optimization and indexing, caching strategy implementation, and performance monitoring and measurement.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving multiple optimization techniques and performance measurement. Requires understanding of React optimization patterns and database performance.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide testing and deployment into: comprehensive user flow testing scenarios, Edge Functions deployment and configuration, production environment setup and configuration, end-to-end test automation, production monitoring and health checks, and post-deployment validation and rollback procedures.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving comprehensive testing, deployment orchestration, and production environment management. Critical final phase requiring coordination of all system components.
